column5: Wonder if you do  a shoal carp the same way? Joe
..and you guys like each other do you now!!!  Steve
Watched that the other day too GCD.  That guy's pretty slick with a blade!  I also came across this vid..... Love the music  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fe1kwXD69BI  Corn Nug
I still like dawg OK.Maybe I have my species mixed up.I always thought a shoal carp was what them Yankees call a Musky..sorta like a pike but bigger! Joe
I didn`t look, this yankee doesn`t fillet pike.
i clean pike very similar but i take the fillet right off instead of flipping it over,but its very effective.. all he needs now is a  frying pan with hot oil & fish-crisp...cheers
Well that fish did not look dead to me when he started filletting it......EUWW!!.....LOL
I'm all for fresh fish green   But atleast make sure its really dead & not still floppin before u take the electric knife to it.......  lol

GCD-  I really tried to listen and see if he had a some sorta accent and I can tell ya fer sure he aint have no accent dont ya know. You just quit picken on us yankee guys or were gonna have to kick yer yas again...  Great video thanks for posting the link!  - Steven
Don't you jus' shoot the bones out and cook 'em on the smokin' barrel?
